title: Update Pro upgrade button text to show $20 payment prompt

requirements.summary: Change the Pro upgrade call-to-action text from 'Please log in to upgrade' to 'Pay $20 to upgrade'
acceptanceCriteria: The Pro upgrade button or prompt displays 'Pay $20 to upgrade' instead of 'Please log in to upgrade'
The text change is visible in the Pro features modal or upgrade flow
The $20 price is clearly communicated to users before they initiate checkout

file_operations.description: Update the checkout button text to display 'Pay $20 to upgrade' instead of 'Please log in to upgrade'. Ensure the $20 price is prominently displayed before the user clicks the checkout button.
Update any Pro upgrade call-to-action text to display 'Pay $20 to upgrade' instead of 'Please log in to upgrade'. Verify consistency with the pricing information already shown on the page.
